entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
